input.sentences: the art museum was full of interesting sculptures .
some of the artwork hanging was bold and vibrant .
others were open to a great deal of interpretation .
the visitors posed with the bizarre installations .
they had a nice visit to the museum
output.sentences: The art museum was holding an exhibit featuring statues.
This was very different to the normal 2-d art the museum was known for.
The most expressive piece featured the dancing women.
Some folks took really well to these oddities.
While others referred to just look at the older 2-d paintings on the walls.
